meanings.definition: Saxifrages: a plant of the saxifrage family, typically with star-shaped flowers.
meanings.sent1: In the garden, the saxifrages added a pop of color with their star-shaped flowers.
meanings.sent2: The hiker admired the saxifrages growing among the rocks.
meanings.sent3: The saxifrages in the flower bed seemed to be gossiping about the tulips.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like the star-shaped saxifrages in full sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The delicate saxifrages danced in the breeze, enchanting all who passed by.

meanings.definition: Saxifrages: a genus of plants in the saxifrage family, typically found in rocky habitats.
meanings.sent1: The saxifrages nestled comfortably among the rocks, thriving in their rocky habitats.
meanings.sent2: Botanists study the saxifrages to understand their adaptation to rocky environments.
meanings.sent3: The saxifrages held a secret meeting to discuss the best rock climbing routes.
meanings.sent4: The saxifrages stood tall like guardians of the rocky terrain.
meanings.sent5: The saxifrages clung to the cliffs, defying the harsh conditions with grace.
